tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flights (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_number VARCHAR(255),
  airline_name VARCHAR(255),
  origin_airport VARCHAR(255),
  destination_airport VARCHAR(255),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  flight_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE flights (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline VARCHAR(50),
  flight_number INT,
  departure_city VARCHAR(50),
  destination_city VARCHAR(50),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE passengers (
  passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  seat_number VARCHAR(5),
  flight_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE flight_data (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_code VARCHAR(10),
    flight_number INT,
    departure_airport VARCHAR(50),
    arrival_airport VARCHAR(50),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE aircraft_data (
    aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aircraft_model VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    year_of_manufacture INT,
    capacity INT,
    weight_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE pilot_data (
    pilot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    experience_years INT,
    license_type VARCHAR(50),
    airplane_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
  flight_number VARCHAR(10),
  aircraft_type VARCHAR(50),
  departure_airport VARCHAR(50),
  arrival_airport VARCHAR(50),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE aircrafts (
  aircraft_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_type VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  year_of_manufacture INT,
  seating_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE airports (
  airport_code VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
  airport_name VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  timezone_offset INT
);

CREATE TABLE pilots (
  pilot_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  license_number VARCHAR(20),
  hours_flown INT
);

CREATE TABLE FlightData (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_name VARCHAR(50),
  aircraft_type VARCHAR(50),
  departure_airport VARCHAR(50),
  destination_airport VARCHAR(50),
  departure_date DATE,
  arrival_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PassengerData (
  passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_id INT,
  passenger_name VARCHAR(50),
  seat_number VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  baggage_weight DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CrewData (
  crew_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_id INT,
  crew_name VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceData (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentData (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_id INT,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  severity_level INT
)
